snippet: The state will recognize more than 300 same-sex marriages performed during a brief window when they were allowed last year.
abstract: Michigan will recognize more than 300 same-sex marriages performed during a brief period when they were allowed in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The state will recognize more than 300 same-sex marriages performed during a brief window when they were allowed last year.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
